Texts.Eng: Our homeworld all but decimated after the First Contact War and the following inter-Spawnpool territorial disputes, the Skathian people were forced to head outward among the stars. With no real guidance, we blindly groped among the cosmos for a new home. We found many.

While invention was something we'd always excelled at, astronomy was not. Our knowledge of the stars was limited. We are, on the other hand, the most capable undersea species there is and our own architectural style had an advantage: it was already designed for high pressure.

without much further argument, we began to seed the universe the only way we knew how: By sending mating pairs to as many worlds as possible. Within only three generations, our society went from ironworking to interstellar travel. Imagine where it could take us next?
